table.name: vtiger_bhsstock
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsstock` ( `bhsstockid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhsstock_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsstockid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhsstockcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsstock` ( `bhsstockid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsstockid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
